recipe.title: Roquefort Terrine
ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon coarsely chopped walnuts, toasted
instructions: Purée half of cheese with butter in a food processor. Transfer purée to a bowl and fold in remaining cheese, 1/4 cup nuts, and pepper. Spoon into a small crock and smooth top. Chill, covered, at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend.
Before serving, let terrine soften about 30 minutes, then sprinkle top with remaining tablespoon nuts.
